items.name: Eager Claws
items.target: One creature or object per minion

effects.tier2: 5 damage; the target takes a bane on their next strike
effects.tier3: 7 damage; the target takes a bane on their next strike

items.name: Feast
items.trigger: The whelp reduces a non-minion creature to 0 Stamina.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The whelp transforms into a mindkiller whose Stamina equals their squad's Stamina pool before transforming. The Stamina pool then loses the whelp's Stamina.
Whenever a non-minion voiceless talker within 5 squares of the whelp uses a psionic ability, they can do so as if they were in the whelp's space.
